title: Who is Israel Katz, Israel’s new defense minister?
content: Analysts describe Katz as a yes-man who will give Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu more freedom on the battlefield and help ensure his own political survival.
summary: Analysts describe Katz as a yes-man who will give Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu more freedom on the battlefield and help ensure his own political survival.

title: Trump win leaves Russia jubilant and Europe putting on a brave face
content: Israel and Ukraine’s leaders were among the first to congratulate Trump, even before most outlets had called his victory.
summary: Israel and Ukraine’s leaders were among the first to congratulate Trump, even before most outlets had called his victory.

title: What Trump’s win means for the world’s most pressing problems
content: Republican Donald Trump will face immediate challenges as the Israel-Gaza and Russia-Ukraine wars rage. What his election means for NATO, aid, trade and more.
summary: Republican Donald Trump will face immediate challenges as the Israel-Gaza and Russia-Ukraine wars rage. What his election means for NATO, aid, trade and more.

title: Ukraine says forces clash with North Korean troops for first time
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky implored his Western allies to take action over Russia’s use of North Korean troops in the war.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky implored his Western allies to take action over Russia’s use of North Korean troops in the war.

title: Lebanese first responders say they are being targeted by Israeli strikes
content: At least 178 Lebanese emergency workers have been killed in Israeli attacks since last October. Three-quarters of the deaths have occurred in the past six weeks.
summary: At least 178 Lebanese emergency workers have been killed in Israeli attacks since last October. Three-quarters of the deaths have occurred in the past six weeks.

title: What this U.S. election showed the world about America
content: Harris and her allies cast Trump as unprecedented, fascistic threat. Trump, meanwhile, stewed in the same angry ultranationalism that powered his earlier presidential bids.
summary: Harris and her allies cast Trump as unprecedented, fascistic threat. Trump, meanwhile, stewed in the same angry ultranationalism that powered his earlier presidential bids.

title: Netanyahu fires Defense Minister Yoav Gallant, prompting protest in Tel Aviv
content: Yoav Gallant had emerged as one of Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s fiercest and most public critics over his approach to the war in Gaza and the failure to reach a hostage deal with Hamas.
summary: Yoav Gallant had emerged as one of Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s fiercest and most public critics over his approach to the war in Gaza and the failure to reach a hostage deal with Hamas.

title: Netanyahu ousts defense minister, a political rival and fierce war critic
content: Yoav Gallant clashed with Netanyahu over his handling of the war in Gaza and, more recently, over the enlistment of the ultra-Orthdox in the Israeli military.
summary: Yoav Gallant clashed with Netanyahu over his handling of the war in Gaza and, more recently, over the enlistment of the ultra-Orthdox in the Israeli military.

title: How the U.S. election process differs from others around the world
content: The decentralized system of election management in the United States has few parallels. But results in many countries can take time to finalize.
summary: The decentralized system of election management in the United States has few parallels. But results in many countries can take time to finalize.

The world is trying to make sense of the U.S. electoral college
content: The United States has a distinctive system for electing presidents indirectly — a source of confusion for those following the Trump-Harris race internationally.
summary: The United States has a distinctive system for electing presidents indirectly — a source of confusion for those following the Trump-Harris race internationally.

title: Israelis and Palestinians find little hope in divisive U.S. election
Brazilian police say they’ve solved the murder of former Post contributor
content: Authorities have concluded that the killings of British journalist Dom Phillips and Indigenous rights activist Bruno Pereira were an act of retaliation targeting Pereira.

Diver finds and returns graduation ring lost for decades in the ocean
content: Alex Davis used a metal detector to find a lost graduation ring buried in Barbados. He returned it to its owner in Canada just before the man’s 83rd birthday.
summary: Alex Davis used a metal detector to find a lost graduation ring buried in Barbados. He returned it to its owner in Canada just before the man’s 83rd birthday.

title: Player dies after being struck by lightning during soccer match in Peru
content: Teams in a local tournament in the Andean highlands east of Lima were leaving the pitch amid a weather delay when lightning struck, injuring several other players.
summary: Teams in a local tournament in the Andean highlands east of Lima were leaving the pitch amid a weather delay when lightning struck, injuring several other players.

title: Israel ends agreement with U.N. agency for Palestinians
content: Israel said it has withdrawn from the 1967 deal legally recognizing UNRWA. The Knesset has passed legislation curbing the U.N. agency’s activities and privileges.
summary: Israel said it has withdrawn from the 1967 deal legally recognizing UNRWA. The Knesset has passed legislation curbing the U.N. agency’s activities and privileges.

title: Russia suspected in plot to target cargo planes in Europe and the U.S.
content: Officials say proxies working for Russia were likely behind bombs destined for DHL flights in Europe, and U.S.-bound planes may have been a future target.
summary: Officials say proxies working for Russia were likely behind bombs destined for DHL flights in Europe, and U.S.-bound planes may have been a future target.

Israeli strikes in eastern Lebanon are hitting civilians without warning
content: At least 10 of 14 strikes Friday that caused casualties in the northern Bekaa Valley were outside the Israeli military’s evacuation zone, a Post review found.

title: Why the U.S. election is so long and others around the world are so short
content: The end of a U.S. election season can feel like the final leg of a marathon. That’s because the U.S. stands out among global democracies for its long campaigns.
summary: The end of a U.S. election season can feel like the final leg of a marathon. That’s because the U.S. stands out among global democracies for its long campaigns.

title: Protesters hurl mud at Spain’s king, queen and prime minister after floods
content: King Felipe, Queen Letizia and Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez were met with anger in Paiporta, a town badly hit by the devastating floods in Valencia.

title: Pro-E.U. candidate wins Moldova runoff despite fears of Russian interference
content: Maia Sandu led with 55.41 percent against Alexandr Stoianoglo, a former prosecutor general backed by the pro-Russian Party of Socialists.
summary: Maia Sandu led with 55.41 percent against Alexandr Stoianoglo, a former prosecutor general backed by the pro-Russian Party of Socialists.
